message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Can you meet me in the middle?
I can see you're serious about the product, but I need to make a profit. I can do $950000, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can do $920000. Can you meet me at that price?
I can see you're really interested in the product, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $960000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can do $930000. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I can do $980000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can do $950000. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm not going to give up yet! I can do $990000, but that's my final offer. Take it or leave it!
